categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: During the youth of Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, there was a Sikurdian Jedi Padawan who was rejected from further Jedi training by the Jedi High Council. In a fit of rage the Padawan began to attack any Jedi he could within the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, wounding and nearly killing the famed Jedi Master Tera Sinube.
